    • Method Detail

      • get

        public <S extends Styleable<S>,B extends Buildable<S,B>> B get(Class<B> builderClass)
        Creates a new builder of the given class and initializes it with the in (getDefaults()) provided values.
        Type Parameters:
        S - The style type.
        B - The primitive type.
        Parameters:
        builderClass - The builder class e.g.: Line,Polyline, Polygon, Image, Text, Line, ...).
        Returns:
        The with default styles and units (the in the getDefaults() initialized builder instance.

      • getDefaults

        public Defaults getDefaults()
        Allows to get and / or change the default configuration values.
        Returns:
        The default configuration values.

      • setDefaults

        public void setDefaults(Defaults defaultValues)
        Allows to set the default values at once.
        Parameters:
        defaultValues - The default configuration values.

      • getCanvas

        public SetAreaOfInterestOrDrawOrWriteable getCanvas(double width,
                                                    double height)
        Creates a new drawing canvas instance. The instance is based on the preconfigured getDefaults() values.
        Parameters:
        width - The canvas width in drawing units.
        height - The canvas height in drawing units.
        Returns:
        A new drawing canvas instance based on the preconfigured values.
